skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.CreateAWork
skill.description: For an agent to create and build a simple object (work). This parameter could be an existing object ("ontology.classes.Object") or a planned object ("ontology.classes.Plannedwork"). In the first case, the agent will ensure that the object is 100% built, in the second case, the object is first created, then 100% built.

parameter.name: work
parameter.description: The element to create and build.

parameter.name: instantaneoulsy
parameter.description: If this parameter is set to 'true', the agent will decide to create and/or build the given element instantaneously, without any physical capability consideration.

link.name: create
link.description: To create and build the work.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when the given work has been created and built.
